thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 2 of 287
thread.title: WBR

author: WBR
title: WBR
text:
EVERTYTHING WAS FANTASTIC. I JUST WISH THEY HAD INFORMED ME THAT I WOULD RECEIVE MY CLOSING PACKAGE BEFORE THE CLOSING.INSTEAD I WAS TOLD I WOULD RECEIVE IT A WEEK AFTER.
I WAS TOLD THAT I WOULD RECEIVE THE CASH DUE TO BORROWER
IN MAIL BUT I THOUGHT YOU GUYS WERE GOING TO TAKE CARE OF
PAY OFF CHECKS. I NORMALLY GO IN AND OUT MY HOUSE THROUGH THE GARAGE.IMAGINE MY SURPRISE WHEN BY CHANCE I WENT OUT THE FRONT DOOR ELEVEN DAYS AFTER CLOSING AND DISCOVERED A WATER STAINED PACKAGE WITH $18,000.00 IN CHECKS INSIDE STICKING OUT FROM UNDER MY WELCOME MAT. IT WOULD HAVE BEEN NICE IF I WERE TOLD TO EXPECT THESE DELIVERIES. OTHER THAN THAT I'M VERY SATISFIED. THANK YOU.
